S

save(String) - Method in class api.DWGraph_Algo
Saves this weighted (directed) graph to the given file name - in JSON format
setInfo(String) - Method in class api.DWGraph_DS.Node_Data
Allows changing the remark (meta data) associated with this node.
setLocation(geo_location) - Method in class api.DWGraph_DS.Node_Data
Allows changing this node's location.
setTag(int) - Method in class api.DWGraph_DS.Node_Data
Allows setting the "tag" value for temporal marking an node - common practice for marking by algorithms.
setWeight(double) - Method in class api.DWGraph_DS.Node_Data
Allows changing this node's weight.
shortestPath(int, int) - Method in class api.DWGraph_Algo
returns the the shortest path between src to dest - as an ordered List of nodes: src--> n1-->n2-->...dest see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shortest_path_problem Note if no such path --> returns null;
shortestPathDist(int, int) - Method in class api.DWGraph_Algo
returns the length of the shortest path between src to dest Note: if no such path --> returns -1
